title: Adnan Sami Gives A Befitting Reply To Pakistani Trolls, Says ‘Your Ostrich Mentality Is Laughable’
text:
Adnan Sami was under the scrutiny of social media trolls from Pakistan after he praised Indian Air Force for its cross border militant operation which destroyed terror basis. The singer originally hails from Pakistan, but now holds Indian citizenship. He recently stood up against the Pakistani trolls and took a dig at them giving a befitting reply.
Twitter
In a tweet, he told the trolls that it is about “eliminating terrorists” and not about “'egos being given a reality check.” He added that their “Ostrich mentality' is 'laughable.” Here’s his tweet.
Dear Pak trolls,
Its not about ur egos being given a reality check today; its about eliminating terrorists who u ‘claim’ r also ur enemies! Ur Ostrich mentality is laughable.Btw, ur abuses expose ur reality & therefore d only difference between u & a bucket of shit is the bucket! — Adnan Sami (@AdnanSamiLive) February 26, 2019
Sami had earlier on February 26 too hailed the IAF efforts and tweeted, "The Force Is With You" @narendramodi ji. Respect to @IAF_MCC .#HowsTheJosh #StopTerrorism #JaiHind ."
Twelve days after the Pulwama terror attack, Indian Air Force (IAF) carried out major strikes at terror camps of Jaish-e-Mohammed in Balakot dropping 1,000kg bombs, which killed up to 350 terrorists, reportedly.
